item.title: Lights off around Pilley Lane and Leckhampton Road, 22nd April
item.description:
A load of these street lights are not working all of a sudden. Pilley Lane close to the junction with Leckhampton Road and along Leckhampton Road by the new Co Op.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170-172, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 22nd April
item.description:
Customer reports that all of the street lights in the vicinity of the location have been out overnight; no power-outage has occurred, but they advise that building works are currently underway in the area. Please can this be investigated asap.
Report on FixMyStreet
